author: Kris Maher
title: Bill Cosby Retrial Expected to Begin Monday
text:
NORRISTOWN, Pa.—Prosecutors were expected to open Bill Cosby’s criminal trial outside Philadelphia Monday morning, but faced a delay as the defense challenged a juror.
Mr. Cosby’s retrial on sexual-assault charges comes roughly 10 months after his first trial here ended in a hung jury and mistrial. The 80-year-old former star of “The Cosby Show” is charged with drugging and sexually assaultingAndrea Constand, a former Temple University employee, in his home outside Philadelphia in 2004.
